de.systemagmbh.interfaces.message
Interface ISysIndexableMessage

All Superinterfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysMessage, ISysMessageConvertable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ASysMessage, DummyISysIndexableMessage
public interface ISysIndexableMessage
extends ISysMessage

This extends the base of all messages with access methods by indices.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Torsten Knauft

Method Detail

addItem

public void addItem(int index,
                    ISysMessageItem item)
Adds a new ISysMessageItem to the message.

Parameters:
index - the index where the item should be inserted. All existing items, beginning at the index, are shifted by one.
item - The ISysMessageItem to add

getItem

public ISysMessageItem getItem(int index)
Returns an ISysMessageItem at the specified position.

Specified by:
getItem in interface ISysMessage
Parameters:
index - The position of the ISysMessageItem
Returns:
the ISysMessageItem or null if the index is valid in the message

getIndex

public int getIndex(ISysMessageItem item)
Returns the index of the given ISysMessageItem or -1 if the item is not in the message.

Parameters:
item - the item to retrieve the index for
Returns:
the index of the item

removeItem

public void removeItem(int index)
Removes an ISysMessageItem from the message at the specified index. If the item is not found, nothing is done.

Parameters:
index - the index where the item should be removed. All existing items, beginning at the index + 1, are shifted by one.

toArray

public ISysMessageItem[] toArray()
Converts the message to an array of ISysMessageItems.

Returns:
an array of ISysMessageItems
